prob140.plots.Plot_expon¶

prob140.plots.Plot_expon(x_limits, lamb, **kwargs)[source]¶

Plots an exponential distribution

Parameters:

x_limits : iterable

Array, list, or tuple of size 2, containing the lower and upper bound to be plotted.

lamb : float

Rate.
Returns:

None
